title: Shane Williamson
text:
is an Australian–Japanese <a href="Speed%20skating">speed skater</a> who competed at the <a href="2014%20Winter%20Olympics">2014 Winter Olympics</a> for Japan.
He competed in the <a href="Speed%20skating%20at%20the%202014%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%205000%20metres">5000 metres</a>, where he finished 26th out of 26.
Williamson made his <a href="ISU%20Speed%20Skating%20World%20Cup">World Cup</a> debut in November 2013. As of September 2014, Williamson's best World Cup finish is 11th, in a 5000 m B race in <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20ISU%20Speed%20Skating%20World%20Cup">2013–14</a>. His best overall finish in the World Cup is 46th, in the <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20ISU%20Speed%20Skating%20World%20Cup%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%205000%20and%2010000%20metres">2013–14 5000 and 10000 m</a>.
He is a member of the <a href="Sankyo%20%28camera%20company%29">Nidec Sankyo</a> speed skating team.
